title: Knight

properties.name: description
properties.value: A large variety of Knights exist in RuneScape.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:KnightThe RuneScape Classic Wiki also has an article on: classicrsw:Knight

A large variety of Knights exist in RuneScape.

  • Basilisk knights, Slayer creatures found in Jormungand's Prison.
  • Black knights, monsters found mainly in the Black Knights' Fortress.
  • Dancing knights, dancing on the tabletop in the Party Room.
  • Knights of Ardougne, found in the East Ardougne marketplace and can be pickpocketed at level 55 Thieving.
  • Knights of Avarrocka, knights from the Enakhra's Lament quest.
  • Knights of the Round Table, King Arthur's knights fought after completion of King's Ransom.
  • Knights of Saradomin, found inside the God Wars Dungeon in the main area and in Saradomin's Encampment.
  • Revenant knight, a type of revenant that inhabits the Revenant Caves.
  • Sir Gerry, a dying knight laying by the entrance to the God Wars Dungeon.
  • Temple Knights, an elite section of White Knights headed by Sir Tiffy Cashien.
  • Void Knights, an order of knights loyal to the god Guthix who oversee the Pest Control minigame.
  • White knights, found at the White Knights' Castle in Falador.
  • For all pages beginning with knight, see Special:PrefixIndex/Knight.
 This page is used to distinguish between articles with similar names.
If an internal link led you to this disambiguation page, you may wish to change the link to point directly to the intended article.
rawContent:
{{External|rs|rsc}}A large variety of '''Knights''' exist in ''[[RuneScape]]''.

*[[Basilisk knight]]s, [[Slayer creatures]] found in [[Jormungand's Prison]].
*[[Black knight]]s, [[monster]]s found mainly in the [[Black Knights' Fortress]].
*[[Knight (Falador Party Room)|Dancing knights]], dancing on the tabletop in the [[Party Room]].
*[[Knights of Ardougne]], found in the [[East Ardougne]] marketplace and can be pickpocketed at level 55 [[Thieving]].
*[[Knights of Avarrocka]], knights from the [[Enakhra's Lament]] [[quest]].
*[[Knight Waves Training Grounds|Knights of the Round Table]], [[King Arthur]]'s knights fought after completion of [[King's Ransom]].
*[[Knights of Saradomin]], found inside the [[God Wars Dungeon]] in the main area and in [[Saradomin's Encampment]].
*[[Revenant knight]], a type of [[revenant]] that inhabits the [[Revenant Caves]].
*[[Knight (Sir Gerry)|Sir Gerry]], a dying knight laying by the entrance to the [[God Wars Dungeon]].
*[[Temple Knights]], an elite section of [[White Knights]] headed by [[Sir Tiffy Cashien]].
*[[Void Knights]], an order of knights loyal to the [[god]] [[Guthix]] who oversee the [[Pest Control]] [[minigame]].
*[[White knight]]s, found at the [[White Knights' Castle]] in [[Falador]].

*For all pages beginning with knight, see [[Special:PrefixIndex/Knight]].

{{Disambig}}
